gobblin.data.management.copy.extractor

Class CloseableFsFileAwareInputStreamExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.data.management.copy.extractor.FileAwareInputStreamExtractor
      • gobblin.data.management.copy.extractor.CloseableFsFileAwareInputStreamExtractor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Extractor<String,FileAwareInputStream>, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class CloseableFsFileAwareInputStreamExtractor
extends FileAwareInputStreamExtractor
    Used instead of FileAwareInputStreamExtractor for FileSystems that need be closed after use E.g SftpLightWeightFileSystem.
